00031 CToolTip::CToolTip(QWidget *parent, const char *name ) : QFrame( 0, 0, WStyle_Customize | WStyle_NoBorder | WStyle_Tool | WStyle_StaysOnTop | WX11BypassWM ),
00032   m_filter(false), m_parentWidget( parent ) {
00033 
00034   connect(m_parentWidget, SIGNAL(destroyed()), SLOT(destroyObject()));
00035 
00036   QHBoxLayout* layout = new QHBoxLayout(this,0,0);
00037   layout->setResizeMode(QLayout::FreeResize);
00038 
00039   m_display = new KHTMLPart(this);
00040   m_display->view()->setMarginWidth(4);
00041   m_display->view()->setMarginHeight(4);
00042   layout->addWidget(m_display->view());
00043 
00044   setPalette( QToolTip::palette() );
00045   setMargin( 1 );
00046   setFrameStyle( QFrame::Plain | QFrame::Box );
00047   hide();
00048 
00049   m_parentWidget->installEventFilter(this);
00050   setFilter(false);
00051 }

00054 //}

00057 QWidget* const CToolTip::parentWidget() const{
00058   return m_parentWidget;
00059 }

00062 void CToolTip::tip( const QPoint& p, const QRect& rect, const QString& text ){
00063   qWarning("CToolTip::tip");
00064 
00065   //m_tipRect must have global coordinates!
00066   QPoint globalPos = parentWidget()->mapToGlobal(rect.topLeft());
00067 //  qWarning("tooltip rect is %i|%i with size %i x %i", globalPos.x(), globalPos.y(), rect.width(), rect.height() );
00068   m_tipRect = QRect(globalPos.x(), globalPos.y(), rect.width(), rect.height());
00069 
00070   m_display->begin();
00071   m_display->write(text);
00072   m_display->end();
00073   m_display->view()->setHScrollBarMode(QScrollView::AlwaysOff);
00074 
00075   const QPoint mp = !m_display->view()->verticalScrollBar()->isHidden() ? QPoint(p.x()-5, p.y()-5) : QPoint(p.x()+5, p.y()+5);
00076   QPoint pos = parentWidget()->mapToGlobal( mp );
00077   QRect widgetRect = QRect(pos.x(), pos.y(), width(), height());
00078   if (!KApplication::desktop()->geometry().contains(widgetRect, true)) {
00079     qWarning("outside of the screen!");
00080     QRect intersect = KApplication::desktop()->geometry().intersect(widgetRect);
00081     widgetRect.moveBy(-(widgetRect.width()-intersect.width()),-(widgetRect.height()-intersect.height()));
00082     pos = widgetRect.topLeft();
00083   }
00084   move(pos);
00085 
00086   m_display->view()->setContentsPos(0,0);
00087 
00088   const QRect screenSize = KApplication::desktop()->geometry();
00089   resize((int)((float)screenSize.width()*0.5), 0);
00090   show();
00091 
00092 //now resize to the correct size!
00093   m_display->view()->layout();
00094   resize(m_display->view()->sizeHint());
00095 }

00098 void CToolTip::timerEvent( QTimerEvent* e ) {
00099   killTimers();
00100   if ( !isVisible() ) {
00101 //    startTimer( 15000 );
00102     maybeTip( parentWidget()->mapFromGlobal(QCursor::pos()) );
00103   }
00104   else {
00105 //    setFilter( false );
00106     hide();
00107   }
00108 }
00109 
00111 bool CToolTip::eventFilter( QObject *o, QEvent *e ){
00112   QMouseEvent* me = dynamic_cast<QMouseEvent*>(e);
00113   if (o == m_parentWidget) {
00114     if (e->type() == QEvent::Show) {
00115       setFilter(true);
00116       return false;
00117     }
00118   }
00119 
00120   switch ( e->type() ) {
00121     case QEvent::DragMove:
00122     case QEvent::DragEnter:
00123     case QEvent::DragLeave:
00124     case QEvent::DragResponse:
00125       break;
00126 
00127     case QEvent::MouseButtonPress:
00128     case QEvent::MouseButtonRelease:
00129       if (QMouseEvent* me = dynamic_cast<QMouseEvent*>(e)) {
00130         if (me->state() != Qt::NoButton || me->stateAfter() != Qt::NoButton) { //probaby dragging - show no tip
00131           killTimers();
00132           hide();
00133           break;
00134         }
00135       }
00136       if (isVisible() && widgetContainsPoint(m_display->view()->verticalScrollBar(), me->globalPos()))
00137         break;
00138       else {
00139         hide();
00140         break;
00141       }
00142     case QEvent::KeyPress:
00143     case QEvent::KeyRelease:
00144     case QEvent::FocusIn:
00145     case QEvent::FocusOut:
00146       killTimers();
00147       hide();
00148       break;
00149 
00150     case QEvent::MouseMove:
00151     {
00152       bool validMousePos = widgetContainsPoint(this, me->globalPos());
00153       validMousePos = validMousePos || m_tipRect.contains(me->globalPos());
00154 //        if (m_tipRect.contains(me->globalPos()))
00155 //          qWarning("m_tipRect contains %i | %i!", me->globalPos().x(), me->globalPos().y());
00156 //        else
00157 //          qWarning("m_tiprect DOESNT contain the mouse pos");
00158       if (isVisible() && !validMousePos)
00159         hide();
00160       if (isVisible() && validMousePos)
00161         break;
00162 
00163       if (QMouseEvent* me = dynamic_cast<QMouseEvent*>(e)) {
00164         if (me->state() != Qt::NoButton || me->stateAfter() != Qt::NoButton) { //probaby dragging - show no tip
00165           killTimers();
00166           hide();
00167           break;
00168         }
00169         if (QWidget * w = KApplication::widgetAt( me->globalPos(), true )) {
00170           while ( w && w != parentWidget()) {
00171             w = w->parentWidget();
00172           }
00173           if (w == parentWidget()) {
00174             startTimer(1500);
00175           }
00176         }
00177       }
00178       break;
00179     }
00180     default:
00181       break;
00182   }
00183   return false;
00184 }
00185 
00187 void CToolTip::setFilter( const bool enable ){
00188   if ( enable == m_filter ) return;
00189 
00190   if ( enable ) {
00191      KApplication::kApplication()->installEventFilter( this );
00192      KApplication::setGlobalMouseTracking( true );
00193   }
00194   else {
00195      KApplication::setGlobalMouseTracking( false );
00196      KApplication::kApplication()->removeEventFilter( this );
00197   }
00198   m_filter = enable;
00199 }
00200 
00202 const bool CToolTip::widgetContainsPoint( QWidget* const w, const QPoint& p ){
00203   const QPoint origin = w->mapToGlobal(QPoint(0,0));
00204   if (p.x() >= origin.x() && p.x() <= w->mapToGlobal(QPoint(w->width(),w->height())).x() ) { //x is valid
00205     if (p.y() >= origin.y() && p.y() <= w->mapToGlobal(QPoint(w->width(),w->height())).y() ) { //x is valid
00206       return true;
00207     }
00208   }
00209   return false;
00210 }
00211 
00213 void CToolTip::destroyObject(){
00214   setFilter(false);
00215   deleteLater();
00216 }
